pageTitle: City of San Antonio - Agenda Details Printable Version
textBeforeTable: Liaison: Andrea Martinez - (210) 206-5544 TThe City of San Antonio Head Start Policy Council is comprised of seven (7) members and is authorized to act as the Policy Council for the City of San Antonio Head Start Program in accordance with Head Start Federal Regulations. Of the seven (7) members, five (5) are elected parents of children who are currently enrolled in the Head Start program and 2 (two) are members of the community at large, but may also include parents of children who were formerly enrolled in the Head Start program. The community at large members are elected by parent members of the City of San Antonio Head Start Policy Council; however, the Educational Excellence is requested to consider the applicants and offer recommendations to the parents in the following categories/backgrounds: Early Childhood Education, Higher Education, Business, Community At-Large, and/or Medical Representative. The terms are for one (1) year with a term limit of three (3) years. Additionally, five (5) alternate parent members are elected, each serving when the primary is absent from a meeting; however, the maximum number of voting members shall remain at seven (7). The City of San Antonio Head Start Policy Council meets every 1st Tuesday of the month at 6:15 p.m. at Tynan Early Childhood Center, 925 Gulf St., San Antonio, TX 78202. For more information, please go to http://saheadstart.org Head Start Policy Council
textAfterTable: Total Members for Head Start Policy Council: 7  City of San Antonio - Agenda Details Printable Version
